Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.database.UserDAO
public class UserDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing user data from the database. Provides methods to retrieve lists of admins and teachers with their details.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    dbConnection

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static boolean
    deleteUserById(int userId)
    Deletes a user by their user ID, including cleaning up all related data such as: - Nullifying created_by_admin_id references to this user - Deleting enrollments related to this user's classes or student record - Deleting classes taught by this user (if teacher) - Deleting notifications sent by this user - Removing entries from role-specific tables (Admins, Teachers, Students) - Finally deleting the user record itself This operation is performed within a database transaction to ensure atomicity, rolling back all changes if any step fails.
    static List<UsersModel>
    getAdmins()
    Retrieves a list of all admins along with their user details.
    static List<UsersModel>
    getStudents()
    Retrieves a list of all students along with their user and academic details.
    static List<UsersModel>
    getTeachers()
    Retrieves a list of all teachers along with their user details.
    static List<UsersModel>
    getUsersByRole(String role)
    Retrieves a list of users filtered by their role.
    static List<UsersModel>
    manageAdmins()
    Retrieves a list of admins excluding the headadmin, including who created their accounts.
    static List<UsersModel>
    manageStudents()
    Retrieves a list of students along with their user info, academic details, and the admin who created their accounts.
    static List<UsersModel>
    manageTeachers()
    Retrieves a list of teachers along with their user info and the admin who created their accounts.
    static boolean
    updateUser(UsersModel user)
    Updates a user's general and role-specific details in the database.

  • Method Details

    • getAdmins

      public static List<UsersModel> getAdmins()
      Retrieves a list of all admins along with their user details.
      Returns:
      List of UsersModel objects representing admins.

    • getTeachers

      public static List<UsersModel> getTeachers()
      Retrieves a list of all teachers along with their user details.
      Returns:
      List of UsersModel objects representing teachers.

    • getStudents

      public static List<UsersModel> getStudents()
      Retrieves a list of all students along with their user and academic details.
      Returns:
      List of UsersModel objects representing students.

    • manageAdmins

      public static List<UsersModel> manageAdmins()
      Retrieves a list of admins excluding the headadmin, including who created their accounts. Useful for admin management views.
      Returns:
      List of UsersModel objects representing manageable admins.

    • manageTeachers

      public static List<UsersModel> manageTeachers()
      Retrieves a list of teachers along with their user info and the admin who created their accounts. Useful for managing teacher accounts.
      Returns:
      List of UsersModel objects representing manageable teachers.

    • manageStudents

      public static List<UsersModel> manageStudents()
      Retrieves a list of students along with their user info, academic details, and the admin who created their accounts. Useful for managing student accounts.
      Returns:
      List of UsersModel objects representing manageable students.

    • deleteUserById

      public static boolean deleteUserById(int userId)
      Deletes a user by their user ID, including cleaning up all related data such as: - Nullifying created_by_admin_id references to this user - Deleting enrollments related to this user's classes or student record - Deleting classes taught by this user (if teacher) - Deleting notifications sent by this user - Removing entries from role-specific tables (Admins, Teachers, Students) - Finally deleting the user record itself This operation is performed within a database transaction to ensure atomicity, rolling back all changes if any step fails.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID of the user to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • updateUser

      public static boolean updateUser(UsersModel user)
      Updates a user's general and role-specific details in the database. The method updates the Users table and the corresponding role table (Students, Teachers, Admins). The update is performed within a transaction to ensure data integrity.
      Parameters:
      user - The UsersModel object containing updated user details.
      Returns:
      true if the update succeeded, false otherwise.

    • getUsersByRole

      public static List<UsersModel> getUsersByRole(String role)
      Retrieves a list of users filtered by their role. Supports "Admin", "Teacher", and "Student" roles. Returns an empty list if the role is null, empty, or unrecognized.
      Parameters:
      role - The role of users to retrieve (case-insensitive).
      Returns:
      A list of UsersModel objects matching the given role.
